content: Disclaimer: As they are offering a high return, We suggest invest at your own risk.

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.created_time: August 24, 2022, 10:50:51 AMLast edit: August 27, 2022, 12:34:57 PM by irfan_pak10
comments.body: We are asked to publish and manage the thread. We aren't on the official team.Disclaimer: As they are offering a high return, We suggest investing at your own risk.

comments.author: cryptoperkele
comments.body: Ok, few things: In the homepage math doesn't make any sense to me. You are saying that Fixed staking APY is 382,945%. Where that number is coming from? With 382,945% annual percent interest, $1000 is $3829450 and that's not even having counting in the compound interest you have, and with that we would probably have such a big number i would have to google the amount of zeroes to have a name for it.Also please don't use USD in big bold letters in this when you don't clearly mean $ but the token, is very misleading and most likely highly illegal.

comments.author: nira09
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoperkele on August 25, 2022, 09:16:19 AMOk, few things: In the homepage math doesn't make any sense to me. You are saying that Fixed staking APY is 382,945%. Where that number is coming from? With 382,945% annual percent interest, $1000 is $3829450 and that's not even having counting in the compound interest you have, and with that we would probably have such a big number i would have to google the amount of zeroes to have a name for it.Also please don't use USD in big bold letters in this when you don't clearly mean $ but the token, is very misleading and most likely highly illegal.Yes, I don't understand that either. it is said that interest worth 0.0235% is paid every 15 minutes.1 hour = 4 times payment1 day = 96 times payment1 year = 35,040 payments35,040 x 0.0235% = 823.44%How can it be 382.945% shouldn't it be 823.44%?

comments.author: TridentProtocol
comments.body: For the APY question, please see the white paper: https://trident-protocol-1.gitbook.io/trident-protocol/how-the-apy-is-calculated

comments.author: jovan85
comments.body: How long will the token be locked on 365 or can it be withdrawn earlier For example, for a month or whenever we want?

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.created_time: September 04, 2022, 09:58:02 PMLast edit: September 05, 2022, 08:33:47 PM by ololajulo
comments.body: Trident is trading on pancakeswap and BMflokiswap ( https://t.co/SLf4gJGwIa ), although I cant tell if the listing is official but it is announced on the twitter. Do I have anyone with the knowledge of the APY and vesting period? How does the team of the project looks like? They just burn a good value of the token, is it going to be occasional, one time or regular?
